bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: Remmina's copy-paste clipboard between machines stop working after upgrade to Fedora24.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): remmina-plugins-rdp-1.2.0-0.13.rcgit.7.fc24.x86_64 remmina-1.2.0-0.13.rcgit.7.fc24.x86_64
How reproducible: I have old configs from previous Fedora23 version (remmina-1.2.0-0.8.git.b3237e8.fc23.x86_64.rpm):
[remmina_pref] secret=xxx save_view_mode=true invisible_toolbar=false default_action=0 scale_quality=0 hide_toolbar=false hide_statusbar=false small_toolbutton=false view_file_mode=0 resolutions=640x480,800x600,1024x768,1152x864,1280x960,1400x1050 main_width=700 main_height=400 main_maximize=false main_sort_column_id=3 main_sort_order=0 sshtunnel_port=4732 applet_quick_ontop=false applet_hide_count=false recent_maximum=10 default_mode=0 tab_mode=0 recent_VNC=x.x.x save_when_connect=true always_show_tab=false hide_connection_toolbar=false show_quick_search=false expanded_group= toolbar_pin_down=false applet_new_ontop=false applet_enable_avahi=true disable_tray_icon=false minimize_to_tray=false hostkey=65516 shortcutkey_fullscreen=102 shortcutkey_autofit=49 shortcutkey_nexttab=65363 shortcutkey_prevtab=65361 shortcutkey_scale=115 shortcutkey_grab=65508 shortcutkey_minimize=65478 shortcutkey_disconnect=65473 shortcutkey_toolbar=116 vte_font= vte_lines=512 recent_RDP=x.x.x.x rdp_use_client_keymap=0 rdp_quality_0=6F rdp_quality_1=7 rdp_quality_2=1 rdp_quality_9=80 auto_scroll_step=10 vte_allow_bold_text=false floating_toolbar_placement=0 hide_quick_connect=false keystrokes=Send hello worldÂ§hello world\\n show_buttons_icons=0 show_menu_icons=0 vte_system_colors=false vte_foreground_color=rgb(192,192,192) vte_background_color=rgb(0,0,0) toolbar_placement=0 ssh_loglevel=1 ssh_parseconfig=true
and RDP-connection: [remmina] disableclipboard=0 ssh_auth=0 clientname= quality=0 ssh_charset= ssh_privatekey= console=1 resolution= group=rdp password=. name=user ssh_loopback=0 shareprinter=0 ssh_username= ssh_server= security=rdp protocol=RDP execpath= sound=off exec= ssh_enabled=0 username=username sharefolder=/home/user/Downloads domain=DOMAIN server=10.10.10.10 colordepth=15 scale=1 viewmode=1 window_maximize=1 keyboard_grab=1 window_height=707 window_width=1272 cert_ignore=1 gateway_server= disablepasswordstoring=0 sharesmartcard=0 gateway_usage=0 precommand= scaler_expand=1 loadbalanceinfo=
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Connect to remote RDP-server. Highlight some text, press remote HostKey+C and local HostKey+V. And nothing happens.
Actual results: Copy/paste between remote RDP-machine and local does not work
Expected results:
Additional info:

freerdp-2.0.0-23.20170302git210de68.fc25, freerdp1.2-1.2.0-6.fc25, guacamole-server-0.9.11-3.fc25, remmina-1.2.0-0.32.20170302git1da1fb6.fc25, vinagre-3.22.0-4.fc25, weston-1.12.0-6.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-7191d8e808
